mapper.update: MERGE INTO UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL USING UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONTENT_TMP ON (UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONTENT_TMP.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID AND UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID=#{headId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.SMS_CONTENT=UO_OP_ACTIVITY_CONTENT_TMP.SMS_CONTENT

UPDATE UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL C SET C.PUSH_SCHEDULING_DATE=( SELECT (CASE WHEN P.PUSH_METHOD='IMME' OR P.PUSH_METHOD='FIXED' THEN P.PUSH_PERIOD ELSE P.PUSH_PERIOD||C.ORDER_PERIOD||'00' END) FROM UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN P WHERE C.HEAD_ID=P.HEAD_ID AND C.PLAN_DT=P.PLAN_DATE_WID ) where C.HEAD_ID=#{headId} AND C.PLAN_DT=#{planDateWid}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where HEAD_ID=#{headId} AND PLAN_DT=#{planDateWid} AND SMS_CONTENT IS NULL
SELECT count(*) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where HEAD_ID=#{headId} AND PLAN_DT=#{planDateWid} AND LENGTH(SMS_CONTENT)>#{limit}
SELECT count(*) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where HEAD_ID=#{headId} AND PLAN_DT=#{planDateWid} AND INSTR(SMS_CONTENT,'$')>0
SELECT count(*) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where HEAD_ID=#{headId} AND PLAN_DT=#{planDateWid} AND LENGTH(PUSH_SCHEDULING_DATE)!=12
SELECT count(*) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where HEAD_ID=#{headId} AND PLAN_DT=#{planDateWid} AND PUSH_SCHEDULING_DATE IS NULL
